turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place a Starbucks pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a venti caramel macchiato, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering a venti caramel macchiato with almond milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could I also get a dab of honey in that as well, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping to pick up at the Starbucks at 1717 South Rural Road in Tempe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you repeat that street name again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caramel macchiato with almond milk and a bit of honey to be picked up at 1717 south rule road in tempe, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I'll need for this afternoon. Thank you very much for the help. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
